page.title: 19TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: Our project was a traffic survey at the junction of the Nantwich Road A52 and Church Street,Audley.We did the survey on Tuesday 2nd July 1985 at 9.00-9.30, 12.00-12.30 and 5.00-5.30. The total number of cars was more than any other type of vehical at all times of the day.The least at 9.00-9.30 was motor bikes and at 12.00-12.30 and 5.00 -5.30 was buses which was suprising becaause we thought they would be used for bringing people home from work. The total number we counted was 250,201 and 309 in the three sessions.The busiest time was 5.00-5.30 when people were coming home from work.The quietest time was when most people were at work. Class A3
